argument.description: The string to return the length for.

description: The PostgreSQL length function returns the length of the specified string, expressed as the number of characters.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT length('Tech on the Net');
 length
--------
     15
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT length('techonthenet.com');
 length
--------
     16
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT length('');
 length
--------
      0
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT length(' ');
 length
--------
      1
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT length(NULL);
 length
--------
  <NULL>
(1 row)
